This page is automatically generated by the data_page_generator.rb plugin, based on the _layouts/job.html template.

Use the _config.yml to specify the rules for generating pages like this one (including name and template).

In the template, you have access to all the fields defined in data for the record, like, for instance:

Date,Company,Location,Title,Summary,Responsibilities,Skills,Min_Qualifications,Preferred_Qualifications

  • UX Designer
  • We are in search of a passionate User Experience Designer to join our growing HP Helion Cloud UX team. This is a crucial role in which you will contribute to the user-centered design process to create meaningful experience concepts, and to execute on those concepts. Strategic thinking, innovative vision, modern design aesthetics, and ability to work across the organization and build consensus are critical for success in this role. Ultimately, driving complexity to ground and making it elegant, intuitive, and powerful for end users is your goal.
Additionally, you also have access to page.name, which is the filename of the page, that is: index.html.
